    getAdjacent() - Method in class train.Element
    Returns an array that contains the adjacent elements (sections or railways)

    Returns the current direction of the railway

    getElement(int) - Method in class train.Railway

    getIsOccupied() - Method in class train.Element

    getMessage() - Method in exception class train.BadPositionForTrainException

    getRailway() - Method in class train.Element

    getSize() - Method in class train.Railway
